name: Shekar, Inc.
description: Operator of an entertainment and media platform intended to create and share viral Korean pop culture content in English. The company's platform creates shareable content with Korean music, dramas, movies, celebrities, fashion, culture, and more, enabling fans to follow their favorite music and entertainment from the performers.
